hero.label: Lean Problem Solving
hero.title: Structured Problem Solving That Actually Works
hero.description: We don't just fix problems. We teach your team how to find root causes, test solutions, and build sustainable improvements that stick.

challenge.label: The Problem with Problem Solving
challenge.title: Most 'Fixes' Don't Last
challenge.description: Sound familiar? You've fixed the same problem three times this year. The fix worked for a week, then the issue came back. Your team is stuck firefighting instead of improving.
points: Solutions address symptoms, not root causes
No time to properly analyze, just react

approach.label: Our Approach
approach.title: Practical Problem Solving, Not Paperwork
approach.description: We use proven lean methodology adapted to your context. No 50-page reports or death by templates, just clear thinking and disciplined action.

methods.title: Go to Gemba
methods.description: We start where the work happens. Real understanding comes from observing the actual process, talking to the people doing it, and seeing the problem firsthand.

methods.title: Define the Problem Clearly
methods.description: A well-defined problem is half-solved. We help you articulate exactly what's happening, when, where, and how often in measurable terms.

methods.title: Find Root Cause
methods.description: We dig past symptoms using 5 Whys, fishbone diagrams, and data analysis. The goal isn't blame. It's understanding what's actually causing the issue.

methods.title: Develop Countermeasures
methods.description: Solutions are tested before they're implemented. We help your team design experiments, measure results, and adjust based on what actually works.

methods.title: Standardize & Sustain
methods.description: Good solutions become standard work. We help you document what works, train others, and build systems to catch issues before they become problems.

tools.label: Tools We Use
tools.title: Simple Tools, Powerful Results
tools.description: We don't overcomplicate it. These proven tools help teams see problems clearly and find real solutions.

items.title: A3 Thinking
items.description: A structured approach to problem solving on a single page. Forces clear thinking and concise communication.

items.title: 5 Whys Analysis
items.description: Simple but powerful technique to dig past symptoms and find the true root cause of a problem.

items.title: Process Mapping
items.description: Visualize how work actually flows. Reveals waste, delays, and opportunities for improvement.

items.title: PDCA Cycles
items.description: Plan-Do-Check-Act keeps improvement structured and iterative. Test small, learn fast, scale what works.
When you address root causes, problems don't come back
Structured approaches find answers faster than trial and error
Your people learn to solve problems, not just escalate them
Nothing improves morale like actually fixing long-standing frustrations

cta.title: Ready to stop firefighting?
cta.description: Let's talk about the problems that keep coming back. We'll show you how structured problem solving can make a real difference.
